name: Ветер вдоль берега
summary: Traditionally-animated in crisp black-and-white, and lacking any dialogue whatsoever, the film is an enjoyable caution of the troubles facing residents who live on the coastline, completely unprotected from the ferocious winds.
info:
• 中文名: 海边的风
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: {Wind Along the Coast / Veter vdol berega
  • 上映年度: 2004-11-26
  • 片长: 7min
  • 制片国家/地区: 俄罗斯
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 导演: Ivan Maksimov
  • 编剧: Ivan Maksimov
